com.pcloud.networking.serialization

Class Transformer.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcloud.networking.serialization.Transformer.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Transformer

    public static class Transformer.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds Transformer instances

    The builder can add custom TypeAdapter and TypeAdapterFactory to the Transformer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Adds a custom TypeAdapterFactory to the Transformer
      Transformer.Builder addTypeAlias(java.lang.reflect.Type target, java.lang.reflect.Type alias)
      Registers an alias for a type.
      Transformer build()
      Builds the Transformer object with all the custom TypeAdapter and TypeAdapterFactory objects added to the Transformer.Builder

    • Method Detail

      • addTypeAdapter

        public <T> Transformer.Builder addTypeAdapter(java.lang.reflect.Type type,
                                              TypeAdapter<T> adapter)
        Adds a custom TypeAdapter to the Transformer
        Type Parameters:
        T - The concrete java representation of the data type
        Parameters:
        type - The data type that this adapter can work with
        adapter - The TypeAdapter to be added to the Transformer
        Returns:
        A reference to the Transformer.Builder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on null arguments

      • addTypeAdapterFactory

        public Transformer.Builder addTypeAdapterFactory(TypeAdapterFactory adapterFactory)
        Adds a custom TypeAdapterFactory to the Transformer
        Parameters:
        adapterFactory - The TypeAdapterFactory to be added to the Transformer
        Returns:
        A reference ot the Transformer.Builder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on null arguments

      • addTypeAlias

        public Transformer.Builder addTypeAlias(java.lang.reflect.Type target,
                                        java.lang.reflect.Type alias)
        Registers an alias for a type.

        The call binds the target type to be serialized/deserialized as another alias type. This can be useful for binding interface types to their implementations.

        Parameters:
        target - the target type
        alias - the alias type
        Returns:
        A reference to the Transformer.Builder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on null arguments
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the same type is supplied for both target and alias

      • build

        public Transformer build()
        Builds the Transformer object with all the custom TypeAdapter and TypeAdapterFactory objects added to the Transformer.Builder
        Returns:
        A new instance of the Transformer object
